src:
Airlangga Gelar Rapat Bareng Mendag AS, Bahas Apa?
06 Nov 2019, 08:18 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: Menko Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto bertemu Menteri Perdagangan AS Wilbur Ross (Eduardo Simorangkir/detikFinance)

Jakarta - Menko Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto siang ini mengadakan pertemuan dengan Menteri Perdagangan Amerika Serikat (AS) Wilbur Ross di kantornya, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019). Pertemuan itu diadakan sehubungan dengan kunjungan pembantu Presiden Donald Trump tersebut beserta delegasinya ke tanah air.Wilbur Ross tiba di Kemenko Perekonomian sekitar pukul 14.50 WIB. Sebelumnya para menteri dan wakil menteri kabinet Indonesia Maju hadir lebih dulu di lokasi, di antaranya Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi, Menteri Perdagangan Agus Suparmanto, Wakil Menteri BUMN Budi Gunadi Sadikin, dan Wakil Menteri Keuangan Suahasil Nazara.Belum diketahui agenda apa yang akan dibahas pada pertemuan tersebut. Namun sebelumnya Ross sempat membeberkan di acara Indo-Pacific Business Forum, Bangkok pekan lalu, maksud kedatangannya ke Indonesia merupakan bagian dari misi dagang AS ke sejumlah negara Indo-Pasifik.Sebelumnya, Presiden Jokowi diketahui memberikan tugas ke jajaran menteri terkait untuk menyelesaikan urusan Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) dengan Amerika Serikat (AS) dalam waktu satu bulan pasca dilantik. GSP adalah sebuah sistem tarif preferensial yang membolehkan satu negara secara resmi memberikan pengecualian terhadap aturan umum Organisasi Perdagangan Dunia (WTO).Pihak Indonesia dan AS sendiri sejauh ini masih mendiskusikan dan mengevaluasi untuk mendapatkan kesepakatan yang saling menguntungkan. Simak Video "Disebut jadi Menko Perekonomian, Airlangga: Tunggu Rabu Besok"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/dna)
text:
Airlangga Holds Meeting with US Trade Minister, Discuss What?
Nov 06 2019, 08:18 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: Coordinating Minister for the Economy Airlangga Hartarto meets US Commerce Minister Wilbur Ross (Eduardo Simorangkir / detikFinance)

Jakarta - Coordinating Minister for the Economy Airlangga Hartarto this afternoon held a meeting with the Minister of Trade of the United States (US) Wilbur Ross in his office, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). The meeting was held in connection with the visit of President Donald Trump's aide and his delegation to the homeland. Wilbur Ross arrived at the Coordinating Ministry for the Economy at around 14.50 West Indonesia Time. Previously Indonesian ministers and deputy cabinet ministers were present at the location, including Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi, Minister of Trade Agus Suparmanto, Deputy Minister of BUMN Budi Gunadi Sadikin, and Deputy Minister of Finance Suahasil Nazara. Not yet known what agenda would be discussed at the meeting. But previously Ross had revealed at the Indo-Pacific Business Forum, Bangkok last week, the purpose of his visit to Indonesia was part of US trade missions to a number of Indo-Pacific countries. of Preferences (GSP) with the United States (US) within one month after being installed. GSP is a preferential tariff system that allows one country to formally make exceptions to the general rules of the World Trade Organization (WTO). The Indonesian and US parties themselves are still discussing and evaluating to get mutually beneficial agreements. Check out the video "Called to be Coordinating Minister for the Economy, Airlangga: Wait for Wednesday Tomorrow" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / dna)
